FuncDef: This command assigns a Distributed CPU Protection (DCP) policy to the SAP. Only a valid DCP policy can be assigned to a SAP or a network interface. This rule does not apply to templates such as an msap-policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the DCP policy up to 32 characters in length.

ExtraInfo: Default: If no dist-cpu-protection policy is assigned to an SAP, then the default access DCP policy (default-access-policy) is used. If no DCP functionality is required on the SAP, then an empty DCP policy can be created and explicitly assigned to the SAP policy.
